output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r packages, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r data load, include=FALSE}
sites <- read_csv(here("baysys_sites.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

underway <- read_csv(here("baysys_uw.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

compL <- read_csv(here("baysys_comp_L.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r graphs}
compL %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = avg_pco2sw, y = p_co2_out_matm, colour = t_c))+
  geom_smooth(aes(x = avg_pco2sw, y = p_co2_out_matm), method = lm)+
  theme_bw()
```
